msg: (req_check_access): Add some comments with respect to desired functionality.

author: striker
msg: Fix issue 1588: mod_authz_svn should work with SVNParentPath.
(parse_authz_lines): New function.  Takes over the task from check access
to walk the authz_lines for a certain path.  It first checks
'repos_name:repos_path' and if that doesn't render an answer,
(check_access): Refactored to call parse_authz_lines until access is either
granted or denied.  Signature changed, this function now needs the name
(req_check_access): Update calls to check_access().  Include the repository
(II): Describe the syntax for use with SVNParentPath.  Explain how permissions are
